summary: Filter out reads without read group information
description:
Many GATK tools are dependent on having read group information in order to operate correctly. This filter excludes any reads that have not been appropriately identified.

Usage example

     java -jar GenomeAnalysisTk.jar \
         -T ToolName \
         -R reference.fasta \
         -I input.bam \
         -o output.file \
         -rf MissingReadGroup
name: MissingReadGroupFilter
